products.tensp: Onyx Boox Tab Ultra C Pro

features: ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz

connectivity.sim: Dual SIM (nano-SIM and eSIM) - Support for 2 eSIMs

wireless: MagSafe wireless charging up to 25W with compatible 30W adapter or higher

laptop.tensp: Laptop Avita PURA A+ AF14A3VNF56F Silver

information.CPU: Intel® Core™ i9-13900H 2.6 GHz (24MB Cache, up to 5.4 GHz, 14 cores, 20 Threads)
information.Ocung: 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD (chỉ 1 slot, nâng cấp tối đa 1TB SSD)
CongGT: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 featuring power off USB charging
information.Webcam: 720p HD video at 30 fps with Temporal Noise Reduction

information.CPU: Intel Core Ultra 5 125U (12 lõi / 14 luồng; 3.6 GHz; 4.3 GHz; 12 MB Intel Smart Cache)
information.Ocung: 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD (1 khe SSD; Hỗ trợ nâng cấp tối đa 2TB)
information.Webcam: Video conferencing Camera, FHD Camera MISC 2M FHD Camera_CTE

information.RAM: 8GB Soldered DDR5-4800 + 16GB SO-DIMM DDR5-4800 - Up to 24GB (8GB soldered + 16GB SO-DIMM)
information.Ocung: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0×4 NVMe® (Tổng 2 khe M.2 2242 SSD, max 2TB)
CongGT: 1x USB-C (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), with USB PD 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.2
information.Audio: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Dolby Audio™

information.RAM: 32 GB (2×16GB) SO-DIMM DDR5-5600 (Two DDR5 SO-DIMM slots, Up to 32GB DDR5-5600 offering)
information.Ocung: 1TB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0×4 NVMe® (Two M.2 slots: One M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0 x4 slot + One M.2 2280 PCIe 4.0 x4 slot)
information.ManHinh: 14" WUXGA (1920×1200) OLED, 400nits Glossy, 100% DCI-P3, DisplayHDR™ True Black 500, 60Hz
CongGT: 2x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with USB PD 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4
information.Audio: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Dolby Audio™
information.Webcam: FHD 1080p + IR with Privacy Shutter, ToF Sensor

information.Ocung: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0×4 NVMe® (Còn trống 1 khe 2.5" HDD, hỗ trợ lên đến 1TB, Không kèm cáp Sata HDD)
CongGT: 1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 1 (hỗ trợ truyền dữ liệu, Power Delivery 3.0 và DisplayPort™ 1.2)
